episode_event_specialcos01_ch0125_40_guz:
A few days before the day of the Battle of the
Golden Spheres...
Heh! Keep beating ’em down, Buzzwole!
Ugh... What an annoying attack.
They aren’t called Ultra Beasts for nothing, huh.
Yeah, or so I’ve heard.

So you’ve heard? I thought that Pokémon was
your partner.

I can’t believe you’re battling with a Pokémon
that you don’t even know anything about.

Hey, gimme some credit. I did ask Madam Prez
about ’em, OK?

Buncha complicated stuff, if you ask me, but in
short, Ultra Beasts are rad Pokémon from another
dimension, yeah?

That’s all I have to know! My partner’s my
partner, no matter what it is or where it
came from!

All that matters is that anyone who crosses us
gets a good beatdown!
Must be nice, having such a one-track mind.

All right, let’s go again, Buzzwole! Time to destroy
’em even more!
W-wait a sec! We need a break.
Hmph. Pathetic. We’re just getting started!

Ugh... Not all of us have endless stamina like
you two.
Why are you so gung ho about this, anyway?

It’s not like you. When did you start taking
events seriously?
Hmph! As if. I’m not training for the event...
I’m doing it for my partner.
You mean Buzzwole?
Yeah. Buzzwole’s like us, y’know...
An outcast.
I guess that makes sense.

We’re similar, so I figured we should team up.
And we’re gonna prove we’re the baddest sync
pair there ever was!

This Battle of the Golden Spheres thing is the
perfect stage to do just that!

Oho! So you’re going to work together with your
partner, are you?
What do you want, old geezer?

Hello there! Sorry to interrupt, but I’ve been
looking for a training partner to prepare for the
upcoming event!
If you don’t mind, would you care to battle us?

Ho! A battle between you two promising Trainers
would be a sight to see indeed!

Surely, the great leader of Team Skull wouldn’t
shrink from a challenge, would he?
Tch. Fine.

Heh. What happened to all that gusto you had
earlier, huh?

I said fine! If we’re doin’ this, I’m gonna beat
you down!
You’d best be ready to get crushed!
Sorry, but I don’t plan on losing to you, either!
Let’s go, Buzzwole! We’re gonna obliterate ’em!

Wow! It’s hard to believe you still had so much
energy to battle after all that training you did!

We’ll have to train even harder, won’t
we, Keldeo?

Look who’s talkin’! You’re the one pushin’ us to the
limit here!

We still gotta work out more if this is all we
can do.
Really?

It seemed your Buzzwole had enough leisure time
to flex and pose during that battle, no?
Nah, that ain’t it.

Flexing’s just Buzzwole’s thing. It’s not like it was
having an easy time in battle.

No matter what I say, that’s the one thing it just
won’t stop doing, even when it’s in battle.

It can be a pain sometimes, but if Buzzwole’s not
gonna budge, I just gotta go with it.

I see! So you’ve decided to bring out the best in
your partner!

That ain’t it, old man! If you’re done here,
buzz off!
Ah, I’m not done yet, actually.

Crabominable was watching your battle just now,
and it seems like he wants to challenge you, too!

Why don’t you show us more of what you and
your partner can do!

Heh, bring it on! Time for another beatdown,
Buzzwole!

Ugh, seriously? You still have the energy for
another round?
Did something happen in the past with those two?
Hmph. They’re just a pair of clumsy numskulls.
Make them holler, Crabominable!
That all you got, old man? Smash ’em, Buzzwole!
